channel.title: Basic Compliler?
channel.description:
Im in desperate need of a compiler. Contribute please?
EDIT: I press compile and get the message: "The system cannot find the path specified"
My compiler looks like this: [sup]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/sup]
I have JDK update 12. Would it be a problem on the compilers end or mine?
Thanks

item.title: Basic Compliler?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

[quote=“Vanityx, post:1, topic:262168”]Im in desperate need of a compiler. Contribute please?

EDIT: I press compile and get the message:
“The system cannot find the path specified”

My compiler looks like this:
[sup]@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause[/sup]

I have JDK update 12.
Would it be a problem on the compilers end or mine?

Thanks[/quote]

Change the “06” to “12”

Read full topic

item.title: Basic Compliler?
item.dc:creator: @walkineagle walkineagle
item.description:
@walkineagle wrote:

no, use this as your compiler
go into edit and paste this…
@echo off
echo sigh, your editing probally didn’t work? well we’ll see…
title Brett’s Compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
